skills.name: Tempting Dream
skills.description: Attacks the enemy target to absorb the Attack Bar by 15% with a 30% chance and puts the enemy to sleep for 1 turn with a 10% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your Attack Speed.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Nightmare Melody
skills.description: Puts all enemies to sleep for 1 turn and inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance, each.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Distorted Healing Music
skills.description: Attacks all enemies to put them to sleep for 1 turn and creates a shield that's equivalent to 30% of the damage on all allies for 2 turns. The damage of this skill increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
